servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Complete solutions for a circular gypsum economy.

service1.title: Gypsum Waste Collection
service1.description: We offer a flexible and efficient collection service tailored to your project's needs. Our goal is to make it easy for you to manage gypsum waste in an environmentally friendly way.
service1.alt: Large bags of gypsum waste ready for collection at a construction site.
points: Delivery of containers and bags in various sizes.
Flexible collection frequency based on your needs.

service2.title: Recycling and Processing
service2.description: At our state-of-the-art facility, gypsum waste is transformed into a valuable resource. We separate gypsum from paper and impurities through an advanced process that ensures high quality of the final product.
service2.alt: Close-up of a machine processing gypsum waste in a recycling plant.
points: Mechanical separation of gypsum and cardboard.
Cleaning to remove screws, nails, and other foreign elements.
Continuous quality control to meet industry standards.

service3.title: Sale of Recycled Gypsum Powder
service3.description: Our recycled gypsum powder is a cost-effective and sustainable raw material for manufacturers. By using recycled gypsum, you contribute to reduced CO2 emissions and less extraction of natural resources.
service3.alt: A large pile of clean, white recycled gypsum powder.
points: High-quality raw material for the production of new plasterboards.
Can also be used in cement production and soil improvement.
Delivered in bulk or big bags.

howItWorksPage.title: How It Works
howItWorksPage.subtitle: A simple and transparent three-step process.

step1.title: Order & Delivery
step1.description: It all starts with a simple inquiry. You contact us by phone, email, or our contact form. We assess your needs and ensure that the right type and number of containers, whether it's bins or big bags, are delivered to your location at the agreed time.

step2.title: Collection & Transport
step2.description: When the containers are full, you let us know. Our efficient logistics team schedules the collection and ensures that the gypsum waste is transported safely and properly to our receiving facility. We handle all logistics so you can focus on your core business.

step3.title: Recycling & Reporting
step3.description: Upon arrival at our facility, the waste is weighed and registered before entering our advanced recycling process. After processing, you will receive a detailed environmental report. This report documents the amount of waste delivered and your company's positive contribution to the circular economy.

aboutUsPage.title: About Gipsgjenvinning AS
aboutUsPage.subtitle: Our mission is to lead the transition to a circular economy for building materials.

story.title: Our History and Vision
story.p1: Gipsgjenvinning AS was founded in 2010 with a clear vision: to transform how the construction industry handles gypsum waste. We saw enormous potential in a material that too often ended up in landfills.
story.p2: Today, we are Norway's leading player in gypsum recycling. Our vision is a future without gypsum waste, where 100% of all gypsum is converted into new, valuable products. We continuously invest in new technology and expertise to make this vision a reality.
story.alt: Modern recycling plant with a focus on sustainability.

section1.title: 1. Data Controller
section1.content: Gipsgjenvinning AS, through the CEO, is the data controller for the company's processing of personal data.

section2.title: 2. Personal Data Stored
section2.p1: We store the following personal data about our customers: Name, address, phone number, and email address. This applies to contact persons at our corporate clients.
section2.p2: For visitors to our website, we may store anonymized information via cookies for statistics and website improvement.

section3.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
section3.content: We process the information to fulfill our obligations under the agreement with you. We also use the information to provide you with information, offers, and service related to your customer relationship via email, phone, SMS, and mail.

section4.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
section4.p1: Information on name, address, phone, and email address is used to fulfill the purchase agreement. The legal basis for this processing is Article 6(b) of the GDPR.
section4.p2: Where you have consented, the information is also used to provide you with information, offers, and service in connection with your purchase via email, phone, and SMS. The legal basis for this processing is Article 6(a) of the GDPR.

section5.title: 5. Collection of Personal Data
section5.p1: We store the personal data you have provided on our contact form on our websites, or through direct contact with our employees.
section5.p2: We use cookies on our websites to provide visitors with the best customer experience and service.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access your personal data, and the right to request correction, deletion, and restriction of the processing of your personal data. To exercise your rights, please contact us at post@gipsgjenvinning.no.
